titles.title: To restrict the implementation of proposals of the Task Force on Bureau of Indian Affairs Reorganization.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1825-1826)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/20/1993--Introduced. Prohibits, with an exception, the implementation of any reorganization proposal of the Task Force on Bureau of Indian Affairs Reorganization until submitted to the Secretary of the Interior, and submitted to and approved by specified congressional committees.
